award_title: CAREER:  Modeling Services as Interactions: A New Direction in Design and Control of Services
subject: simulation code that doesn't outlive the paper
body:
Hey Andrew,

Built Ouro because I kept hitting the same wallâ€”publish the paper, park the code in a supplement, watch nobody actually reuse the framework. Just reimplement from scratch every time.

It's a platform where computational methods become callable infrastructure. Your stochastic modeling framework stays alive as something others can actually build on, not just read about.

Happy to show you how it works if you're around after the holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
